Shockwave/Vehement/Reflector:




Shockwave watched with interest as the Brotherhood members seemed to be 
leading him to a triangle shaped island, and they were heading for the 
southwestern tip toward an active volcano.  "Where is your base?" he intoned.

"You are staring at it, Decepticon." Vehement said, giving Shockwave a look 
as if he were blind.  Vehement landed on an edge of the crater of the volcano 
called "Oronog".  Below his feet the rock split apart and he hovered down in, 
followed by Reflector and Shockwave, the entrance way sealing shut as if 
nothing had happened and the volcano was normal.
